product_overview: The ERTickAPP Portal Landing Page is a modern, responsive React application that serves as the entry point for the ERManager Consulting Services platform. It features a sophisticated landing page with animated hero texts, interactive dashboard previews, smooth scrolling, and a comprehensive showcase of the platform's features and company information.
core_goals: Provide a visually appealing, animated landing page that effectively showcases the ERManager platform capabilities.
Enable smooth user interaction including seamless transitions between login and dashboard entry.
Offer an interactive dashboard preview system demonstrating various key modules of the platform.
Ensure responsive design supporting mobile and desktop with optimized layouts and animations.
Implement robust client-side login form validation with visual feedback and keyboard shortcuts.
Optimize performance through lazy loading, throttling, and CSS-based animations.
Maintain accessibility with semantic HTML, keyboard navigation, and ARIA attributes.
key_features: Animated hero section with word-by-word reveal cycling through multiple promotional messages and shiny gradient text effects.
Interactive dashboard preview carousel featuring nine different dashboard views with hover/click to change preview images and visual feedback.
Smooth animated transition between 'Enter Dashboard' button and inline login form with fade/zoom effects and error handling.
Comprehensive login form validation including user ID/email format, password complexity requirements, loading states, and keyboard shortcuts like Ctrl+C to clear input fields.
Responsive header navigation that hides/shows on scroll for mobile and remains persistent on desktop with smooth scroll to sections.
Scroll-triggered animations implemented with Intersection Observer to animate sections as they come into view, enhancing visual engagement.
Mobile-optimized highlights carousel with auto-rotation showcasing system benefits in a compact format.
Asymmetric benefits section and a detailed about section with animated decorative elements and SAP integration badges.
Footer featuring company contact details, logo, tagline, and business information with a unique rounded-top design.
Lenis library integration for buttery-smooth scrolling experience on all devices.
Image lazy loading with fade-in transitions to improve perceived performance and reduce initial load times.
Reusable UI components including buttons, cards, inputs, and shiny text for consistent styling and accessibility.
user_flow_summary: User lands on the main landing page and is greeted with an animated hero section cycling promotional text messages.
User can explore the dashboard preview by hovering or clicking different dashboard options to see interactive previews.
User scrolls through sections such as highlights, feature showcase, benefits, and about, experiencing scroll-triggered entrance animations.
User can initiate login by clicking 'Enter Dashboard' which triggers a smooth transition to reveal the inline login form.
User completes the login form with client-side validation feedback; submission shows loading state and error messages if credentials are invalid.
Successful login leads to dashboard access (implementation beyond landing page scope).
On mobile, users experience optimized layout with auto-rotating highlights carousel and header that hides/shows based on scroll direction.
validation_criteria: All animations including hero text reveal, scroll-triggered section animations, and form transitions operate smoothly without jank or UI glitches.
Login form validation correctly enforces required fields, user ID/email format, password complexity rules, and provides real-time error feedback.
Keyboard shortcuts such as Ctrl+C for clearing login inputs function as specified.
Dashboard preview images load lazily with fade-in transitions and swap correctly on hover or tap events.
Responsive layouts adapt seamlessly across mobile and desktop breakpoints with appropriate interaction models.
Scroll behavior is smooth and consistent across browsers and devices using the Lenis library configuration.
Accessibility standards are met including appropriate semantic HTML, keyboard navigation support, and ARIA labels for error messages and form inputs.
Performance optimizations like throttled scroll events and unobserving after animations prevent unnecessary CPU usage and memory leaks.
Footer and contact information are displayed consistently with correct content and styling on all screen sizes.

features.name: Landing Page
features.description: Main landing page with animated hero section, dashboard preview carousel, feature showcase cards, company information sections, smooth scrolling, and inline login form transition. Includes responsive mobile/desktop layouts with Lenis smooth scroll integration.

features.name: Login Page
features.description: Dedicated login page with comprehensive form validation including user ID/email validation, password complexity requirements, error handling, loading states, and keyboard shortcuts (Ctrl+C to clear form). Includes success/error messaging.

features.name: Navigation & Routing
features.description: React Router DOM implementation with routes for landing page (/) and login page (/login).

features.name: Button Component
features.description: Reusable button UI component with variant support, size options, and customizable styling using class-variance-authority and Radix UI slot.

features.name: Card Component
features.description: Reusable card container component with header, title, description, content, and footer sub-components for structured content display.

features.name: Input Component
features.description: Reusable text input field component with customizable styling and accessibility features.

features.name: Shiny Text Component
features.description: Animated text component with gradient shiny effect for eye-catching headings and CTAs.

features.name: Responsive Header
features.description: Sticky navigation header with mobile and desktop layouts, scroll-based hide/show behavior on mobile, logo click to reload, navigation buttons with smooth scroll to sections.

features.name: Hero Section with Text Animation
features.description: Animated hero section with word-by-word text reveal animation cycling through multiple promotional messages, shiny text subheading, and login form transition.

features.name: Login Form Transition
features.description: Smooth animated transition between 'Enter Dashboard' button and inline login form on landing page with fade/zoom animations, form validation, and error handling.

features.name: Dashboard Preview Carousel
features.description: Interactive dashboard preview system with 9 different dashboard options (Overview, Attendance, Incident Management, Leave Requests, Requirements, Ticket Chat, Ticket Status, Time Tracking, Agent Dashboard) that change on hover/click.

features.name: Feature Showcase Cards
features.description: Grid layout of three feature cards (In-Depth Expertise, Customized Strategic Solutions, Data-Driven Insights) with gradient backgrounds, hover effects, and external links to company website.

features.name: Scroll-triggered Animations
features.description: Intersection Observer implementation for animating sections as they scroll into view, including highlights, features, benefits, about, and footer sections.

features.name: Mobile Highlights Carousel
features.description: Auto-rotating carousel displaying system highlights (Real-time updates, Simplified workflow, Insightful reports) on mobile devices with smooth transitions.

features.name: Benefits Section
features.description: Asymmetric grid layout showcasing ERManager Implementation & Support and ERTickAPP with alternating color schemes (navy, yellow, orange) and staggered animations.

features.name: About Section
features.description: Company information section with decorative animated elements, two-column layout on desktop, SAP integration badges, and animated icon graphics.

features.name: Footer with Contact Information
features.description: Comprehensive footer with company logo, tagline, contact details (website, phone, head office address, business hours), and rounded-top design.

features.name: Smooth Scroll Integration
features.description: Lenis smooth scroll library integration with optimized configuration for smooth page scrolling, gesture support, and programmatic scrolling to sections.

features.name: Form Validation System
features.description: Comprehensive client-side validation for login forms including email/username format validation, password complexity requirements (uppercase, lowercase, numbers, special characters), length constraints, and real-time error feedback.

features.name: Image Lazy Loading
features.description: Image loading state management with fade-in transitions for dashboard preview images to improve perceived performance.
